line.text: When thou shalt be disposed to set me light
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And place my merit in the eye of scorn
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Upon thy side against my self Ill fight
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And prove thee virtuous though thou art forsworn
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: With mine own weakness being best acquainted
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Upon thy part I can set down a story
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Of faults concealed wherein I am attainted
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: That thou in losing me shalt win much glory
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And I by this will be a gainer too
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: For bending all my loving thoughts on thee
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: The injuries that to my self I do
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Such is my love to thee I so belong
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: That for thy right my self will bear all wrong
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
